topic.title: Meeting racists
topic.body: Hello, what places (online) should I go to find genuine neo-nazis and klansmen? Twitter, here(zeronet) or dark web?

topic.title: Where do you find free money?
topic.body: Rather, where have you found free money online?

topic.title: Political Challenge: Contraversial Political Systems
topic.body:
Since this is a decentralized, and possibly anonymous, chat site; try and think of a controversial political system and how you could get people to willingly support and endorse the system.
For example: How would you get people to not only endorse but openly identify as a Communist? And what changes would you make to the system that would receive mass public support?

topic.title: Your embarrassing sex fetishes?
topic.body: One of them is being an anon cumdump......

1569725313_1JbYWzY92aoLHfoCKnhnEUekcEbbe.body:
> [randomshits](#comment_183_1CuFETj5LtyEduzaoAcdv9sMAQtYRqjqDY): Have you tried ZeroTalk? A swift search of the prior discussions can surely find a reader with similar viewpoints. You guys can then meet up on ZeroMe or some other zeronet social site.

Ill try that.
